title: 1.12forge开发测试时出了问题
author: 20050221yandasu
txt_content:
我点了Eclipse的测试后，游戏界面谈了出来，但差不多加载到2/7的时候闪退
Eclipse的报错：

Time: 4/7/18 2:12 PMDescription: There was a severe problem during mod loading that has caused the game to failnet.minecraftforge.fml.common.LoaderExceptionModCrash: Caught exception from replies.author: 土球球
replies.txt_content:
20050221yandasu 发表于 2018-4-7 14:46
是不是blockPineSeedlings.getRegistryName()没有实例化~
他提醒我空指针错误
你注册方块（GameRegistry.registerXXX）是发生在clientInit这个方法调用之前的吗

replies.author: 土球球
replies.txt_content:
Caused by: java.lang.NullPointerException
        at net.minecraft.client.renderer.block.model.ModelResourceLocation.<init>(ModelResourceLocation.java:24)
        at com.github.ManagerBoss.DSIMC.common.block.DSInMinecraftBlocks.clientInit(DSInMinecraftBlocks.java:23)复制代码
把你DSInMinecraftBlocks.java:23这段代码贴出来

replies.author: 20050221yandasu
replies.txt_content:
ustc_zzzz 发表于 2018-4-7 14:51
你注册方块（GameRegistry.registerXXX）是发生在clientInit这个方法调用之前的吗
我是1.12o(︶︿︶)o 唉！
我看看

replies.author: 20050221yandasu
replies.txt_content:
ustc_zzzz 发表于 2018-4-7 14:51
你注册方块（GameRegistry.registerXXX）是发生在clientInit这个方法调用之前的吗
是的，感谢，已经解决
